entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,857Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 433

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: Gotham Harbor
entry.summary:
Author: thebatdadnomad (aylooktaekook)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,969Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 272

Summary: “Bruce, you’re self-destructing,” Tim cut in, and the room went silent for a tense moment as he absorbed the assertion. The pair of them eyed him down with their respective devices – a laptop and a duster – in hand, as he considered leaving now or admitting it all like his lips so direly wanted to do. But Bruce’s mind told him no. Or, Bruce hurts his family so he can drown himself in Gotham Harbor.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,110Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 167

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Don't panic but, we isekaid as a Bat Demon in the DC universe
entry.summary:
Author: Th4t0neFanG1rl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,240Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 98

Summary: You only took one step onto the road, looking both ways as you did, but that truck seemed to come out of nowhere. A flash of blinding white light before...... You wake up surrounded by characters from a comic, or cartoons you used to watch. They're all so real and lifelike, but you'd recognize this group of vigilantes anywhere. AND WHY DO YOU HAVE WINGS!? First fic please be nice.

entry.title: The Nightingales Last Song
entry.summary:
Author: SazzahKO

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,937Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 2

Summary: In this story Bruce Wayne aka Batman is faced with a new foe "The Lady With The Lamp" who seemingly has a vendetta against the Wayne family or Bruce himself for supporting upcoming wide-eyed politician Harvey Dent, as well as the nameless children wandering the streets of Gotham as Bruce takes on this case after getting a false call from his trustworthy source Oracle as someone is impersonating her! Bruce has to not only face his this new threat that presents itself in Gotham but his past as he finally has to confront the damage leaving his city and taking his wealth with him caused. Despite his best efforts at keeping his family safe he finds himself once again in full support of his greatest allies such as Alfred Pennyworth, Jim Gordon, and his adopted sons Dick Grayson, Jason Todd and Tim Drake. This journey is filled with action, slightly gorey scenes and character driven story telling as we are thrown deep into Bruce's mind honing his best detective skills to once again save the city he calls home.

entry.title: Circuit Breaker
entry.summary:
Author: TimmyTurnerIII

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,736Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Batman tended to stay out of Bludhaven's matters. He trusted Nightwing implicitly. If something was happening there, he knew his son well enough to know that he would have it dealt with in a way that he had never been good at; ethically. But when many began going missing, including those from his own company, he couldn't help but step in.Or: An excuse to show off my OC :D

entry.title: I Wear The Black
entry.summary:
Author: Gezmall

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,399Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 146

Summary: There is an impostor running around Gotham. A billowing figure tanking gunshots like they were confetti. He wore the bat-symbol like it was his own, but with spikes across his shoulders and back, making it clear he was not the friendly type. The cape, large and reflecting no light, split by the end in tendrils, which attached themselves to the ceiling and the sprawled bodies and the columns like itty-bitty grappling hooks. No. Not like grappling hooks per se, Nightwing numbly noted. Like small batclaws. "That was not Batman," Nightwing reminisced with more ease than he felt. "There's a fairly," he raised his hand where the real Batman's height ended, "big difference."

entry.title: Red Rover, Red Rover, Send Robin on Over
entry.summary:
Author: CaptainBrookeworm

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,470Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 8

Summary: “I will drive,” Damian announces. “No.” Jason grabs him by the scruff of his robes before he can squirm away. “Tim’s driving.” Damian whirls, eyes bright. “I am perfectly capable-” “Yes, Damian, you are, but you’re also too short to reach the pedals.”Jason’s honestly surprised he doesn’t get a knife in the gut for that. Tim is wise enough to keep his mouth shut. Wise - Jason decides firmly - but also breathtakingly stupid, because he takes two steps away from the truck and almost falls flat on his face when his injured leg gives out.Jason catches him, right in time for him to say, “Right. Stab wound. Forgot about that.” Jason sighs, casts his gaze to the sky, and mentally apologizes to Bruce. He’s herding cats here. He and Dick weren’t this bad, were they? (They were, he knows they were, which just makes this whole fiasco even more annoying.) - OR: Damian, Jason, and Tim meet as prisoners of the League of Assassins and make that everyone else’s problem

entry.title: Operation: Beyond the Veil
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,540Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 25

Summary: World peace has finally arrived—and the Justice League is savoring every second. All except Bruce, whose sharp instincts sense the storm approaching while the rest of the world relaxs. He was right. When the Circle of the Black Blood resurges under the command of the vengeful Archmage Vikram Seth, a confrontation in Mumbai ends in tragedy: Bruce, Oliver, and Shayera are struck by an arcane curse that causes black rosebushes to sprout from their wounds, consuming them alive. With time running out and conventional magic failing, Clark is forced to break through Bruce's final barrier and reveal a secret not even the League knew: the existence of two interdimensionaly powerful mages living hidden right under everyone's noses… in Gotham. Now, the League's last hope rests with Bruce's most closely guarded friends—and the magical sanctuary they call home.
